page.title: 20LIFE IN FINZEAN IN 1985.
page.content: Most families follow{a busy,placid, {routine lifestyle}in a friendly community in beautiful surroundings. There is much more variety in food and clothes since a generation ago and many more recreational and educational opportunities. A well stocked freezer and improved incomes have greatly increased the variety of diet from mainly porridge, fresh or salt fish,rabbit,stovies, skirlie, kale and kale brose. Most housewives still bake scones, cakes, pancakes and oatcakes but bought sweets and biscuits are plentiful. {Spare time activities}are football and badminton,golf at Tarland,indoor sports,swimming and crafts at Aboyne Community Centre and various clubs. {Doric} is still spoken in most homes and recognised at school.
